attributes.action: Take Supersize vs Superskinny off the air
attributes.additional_details: The channel 4 programme Supersize Superskinny causes viewers more harm than good. It encourages body shaming and throws  numbers of body statistics, calories and waistlines at the viewer. It does not promote a healthy approach to food or life. One of the key issues of this programme is also the reputation it has to be known as a trigger for eating disorder sufferers. It needs to be stopped.
